titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 150th anniversary of the Maryland Campaign during the Civil War.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 9/19/2012--Introduced. Commemorates the 150th anniversary of the Maryland Campaign of the Civil War, culminating in the Battle of Antietam. Recognizes the dedication and commitment of the National Park Service, the Maryland Heritage Areas Authority, and all others involved, for preserving the heritage and promoting the rich history of the United States.
